long_description: The Riverside SUP/SOT Universal Cartop Block is a great choice for carrying your sit-on-top kayak or stand up paddleboard. Sticky laminate keeps block in place. The Riverside SUP/SOT Universal Cartop block is compatible with factory racks, no rack, and after-market roof racks. Please note: this is a single block; two blocks are recommended when carrying a kayak or paddleboard.
short_description: The Riverside SUP/SOT Universal Cartop Block is a great choice for carrying your sit-on-top kayak or stand up paddleboard.
